entry.title: æé™
entry.content:
é«˜æ•°æé™

æœ¬åšå®¢å¯ä»¥ä½œä¸ºè‡ªå­¦ææ–™ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä½œä¸ºè€ƒç ”ç«èµ›å‡¯å“¥-æé™çš„è®²ä¹‰ã€‚

è§„åˆ™

  1. æ— ç©·å°ä»£æ¢ï¼šè¢«ä»£æ¢éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸æ•´ä½“ä¸ºä¹˜é™¤å…³ç³»ï¼Œå³è¢«ä»£æ¢éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸ºå› å­ã€‚

    ä¾‹ï¼š$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{x-\sin{x}}{x^3}$ä¸­ä¸å¯æŠŠ$\sin{x}$æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºxã€‚

  2. ç‰¹æ®Šæ— ç©·å°ä»£æ¢ï¼šè‹¥Î±,Î²â†’0ï¼Œä¸”Î± ~ Î±~1~ ï¼Œ Î² ~ Î²~1~ ï¼Œ åˆ™Î±Â±Î² ~ Î±~1~Â±Î²~1~ï¼ˆå¯ç”¨ç­‰æ¯”å®šç†è¯æ˜ï¼‰ã€‚

    ä¾‹ï¼š$x-\sin{x}$å¯æ›¿æ¢ä¸º$arcsin{x}-x$ã€‚

  3. å±€éƒ¨ä»£å…¥ï¼šéé›¶å› å­æ‰èƒ½å±€éƒ¨ä»£æ¢ã€‚

    ä¾‹ï¼š$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{x-\sin{x}\cos{x}}{x^3}$ä¸èƒ½æŠŠ$\cos{x}$ä»£ä¸º1ã€‚

  4. æé™æ‹†åˆ†ï¼šæ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°çš„æé™éƒ½å­˜åœ¨ã€‚

    ä¾‹:

é¢„å¤‡çŸ¥è¯†

  1. å…­å°å‡½æ•°å›¾åƒ: $xe^x, x\ln{x}, \frac{x}{e^x}, \frac{\ln{x}}{x}, \frac{e^x}{x}, \frac{x}{\ln{x}}$

  2. ä¸¤ä¸ªé‡è¦æé™ï¼š

    $\lim_{x\rightarrow0} $ $\frac{sinx}{x}$ = 1

    $\lim{x\rightarrow0}$ $(1+x)^\frac{1}{x}$ = $\lim{x\rightarrow+\infty}$ $(1+\frac{1}{x})^x$ = e

  3. æ— ç©·å°ä»£æ¢ (when $x\rightarrow0$)ï¼š

    $x\sim\sin{x}\sim\arcsin{x}\sim\tan{x}\sim\arctan{x}\sim\ln{(x+1)\sim e^x-1}$

    $\lim_{x\rightarrow1}(x-1)\sim\ln{x}$ğŸ–Š

    $x-sin{x}\sim\frac{1}{6}x^3\sim\arcsin{x}-x$

    $\tan{x}-x\sim\frac{1}{3}x^3\sim x-\arctan{x}$

    $\tan{x}-\sin{x}\sim\frac{1}{2}x^3\sim\arcsin{x}-\arctan{x}$

    $x-\ln(1+x)\sim\frac{1}{2}x^2\sim1-\cos{x}$

    $a^x-1\sim x\ln{a}$

    $(1+ax)^b\sim abx$

  4. ç­‰ä»·æ— ç©·å¤§ä»£æ¢ï¼š

    $\alpha\sim\beta\rightarrow+0, åˆ™\ln{\alpha}\sim\ln{\beta}\rightarrow-\infty$

    è¯æ˜ï¼š $\frac{\ln{a}}{\ln{b}}=\frac{\ln{a}-\ln{b}}{\ln{b}}+1=\frac{\ln{\frac{a}{b}}}{\ln{b}}+1=1$

    1. $\lim{x\rightarrow+0}{\frac{\ln{\arctan{x}}}{\ln{(\ln(1+x))}}}=\lim{x\rightarrow+0}{\frac{\ln{x}}{\ln{x}}}=1$
    2. $\lim{x\rightarrow+0}{(e^x-1-x)}^{\frac{1}{x}}=e^{\lim{x\rightarrow+0}{\frac{\ln(e^x-1-x)}{\ln{x}}}}=e^{\lim{x\rightarrow+0}{\frac{\ln{\frac{x^2}{2}}}{\ln{x}}}}=e^{\lim{x\rightarrow+0}{\frac{2\ln{x}-\ln{2}}{\ln{x}}}}=e^2$
    3. $\lim{x\rightarrow{+}\infty}{(x^{\frac{1}{x}}-1)}^{\frac{1}{\ln{x}}}=e^{\lim{x\rightarrow{+}\infty}\frac{1}{\ln{x}}\ln{x^{\frac{1}{x}}-1}}e^{\lim_{x\rightarrow{+}\infty}\frac{1}{\ln{x}}(\ln{\ln{x}}-\ln{x})}=e^{-1}$

  5. æ³°å‹’å±•å¼€ï¼ˆé€Ÿè®°ï¼‰)

é¢˜å‹æ€»ç»“

å‹ä¸€ï¼šæ„é€ ç­‰ä»·æ— ç©·å°

  1. æ±‚$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\sqrt[m]{1+ax}\sqrt[m]{1+bx}-1}{x}$

æ³•ä¸€ï¼šæƒ³åˆ°$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\sqrt[m]{1+ax}-1\sim\frac{a}{m}x$,åˆ™åº”å›´ç»•è¯¥é¡¹é…å‡‘ã€‚

â€‹ $=\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\sqrt[m]{1+ax}-1}{x}\sqrt[n]{1+bx}+\frac{\sqrt[n]{1+bx}-1}{x}$

â€‹ $=\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{ax}{mx}\bullet1+\frac{bx}{nx}$

â€‹ $=\frac{a}{m}+\frac{b}{n}$

æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æ€»ç»“å‡º$AB-1=(A-1)B+(B-1)$çš„æ’ç­‰å¼ã€‚

æ³•äºŒï¼šå‘ç°åˆ†å­çš„ç»“æ„ï¼Œå¥—ç”¨ğŸ–Šå…¬å¼

â€‹ $=\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\ln{\sqrt[m]{1+ax}\sqrt[n]{1+bx}}}{x}$

â€‹ $=\lim{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\ln{\sqrt[m]{1+ax}}}{x}+\lim{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\ln{\sqrt[n]{1+bx}}}{x}$

â€‹ $=\lim{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\sqrt[m]{1+ax}-1}{x}+\lim{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\sqrt[n]{1+bx}-1}{x}$

â€‹ 2.æ±‚$\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{1-\cos{x}\cos{2x}\cos{3x}\cdots\cos{nx}}{x^2}$

æ³•ä¸€ï¼šæ„é€ 

â€‹ $=\lim{x\rightarrow0}\frac{1-\cos{x}}{x^2}+lim{x\rightarrow0}\cos{x}\frac{1-\cos{2x}\cos{3x}\cdots\cos{nx}}{x^2}$

â€‹ $=\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{2}\times2^2+\frac{1}{2}\times{3^2}+\cdots$

â€‹ $=\frac{1}{2}\times\frac{1}{6}n(n+1)(2n+1)$ (å¹³æ–¹å’Œå…¬å¼)

æ³•äºŒï¼šğŸ–Š

â€‹ $=-\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\ln{\cos{x}\cos{2x}\cdots\cos{nx}}}{x^2}$

â€‹ $=\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\sum_1^n\frac{1-\cos{ix}}{x^2}$

â€‹ $=\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\sum_1^n\frac{(ix)^2}{2x^2}$

å‹äºŒï¼šå¹‚æŒ‡å‡½æ•°($\lim{u(x)}^{v(x)}$)å–æŒ‡å¯¹æ•°($e^{\lim{u(x)}\ln{v(x)}}$)

  1. $\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{\sin{x}}{x}^{\frac{1}{1-\cos{x}}}$

  2. $\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{1}{x3}[({\frac{2+\cos{x}}{3}})^x-1]$

  3. $\lim_{x\rightarrow0}(\frac{e^x+e^{2x}+e^{3x}+\dots+e^{nx}}{n})^{\frac{e}{x}}$

  4. $\lim_{x\rightarrow{+}\infty}[{\frac{(1+\frac{1}{x})^x}{e}]}^x$

  5. $\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{(3+2\tan{x})^x-3^x}{3\sin^2{x}+x^3\cos{\frac{1}{x}}}$

  6. $f(x),g(x)$åœ¨x=0çš„é¢†åŸŸUå†…æœ‰å®šä¹‰ï¼Œä¸”å¯¹$\forall x\in U$,å‡æœ‰$f(x)\not=g(x),ä¸”\lim{x\rightarrow0}{f(x)=\lim{x\rightarrow0}{g(x)}}=a>0,æ±‚\lim_{x\rightarrow0}\frac{[f(x)]^{g(x)}-[g(x)]^{f(x)}}{f(x)-g(x)}$

å‹ä¸‰ï¼šç²¾åº¦ä¸å¤Ÿç”¨æ³°å‹’

entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
